settings.helpText: Number of columns in grid, to span....
Define the focal point of the background image.
Background image repeat settings. Repeat is default, but you'll probably want no-repeat
Background Size: Auto is default, does not need to be set unless overriding a responsive setting.
Origin-Padding is the default behaviour. Origin-Border will tuck the image under the border. Origin-Content respects padding rules.
For the most part the same as origin, but the bg-clip-text option is pretty exciting. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/background-clip
